item.title: Mousepad (‘Loose Me’ Album Art)
item.dc:creator: Judson L Moore
item.description: An appealing accent on one’s desk, this high quality mousepad is designed to provide a smooth, consistent, and durable surface. With personalized design print it will be an attractive decor on every desk. Material: Thick Neoprene Bottom: Non-Slip
item.content:encoded:
An appealing accent on one’s desk, this high quality mousepad is designed to provide a smooth, consistent, and durable surface. With personalized design print it will be an attractive decor on every desk.

  • Material: Thick Neoprene
  • Bottom: Non-Slip

item.title: Square Paper Coaster Set – 6pcs (‘Loose Me’ Album Art)
item.dc:creator: Judson L Moore
item.description: This disposable square coaster with personalized print will not only protect all surfaces, but also serve as an eye-catching design element in any room. Round corners One size White base One side print
item.content:encoded:
This disposable square coaster with personalized print will not only protect all surfaces, but also serve as an eye-catching design element in any room.

  • Round corners
  • One size
  • White base
  • One side print

item.title: Case Mate Slim Phone Cases (‘Loose Me’ Album Art)
item.dc:creator: Judson L Moore
item.description: These premium, super slim cases fit flawlessly, in the meantime being the strongest, lightest and most flexible cases on the market. The surface is perfect for high quality prints, making it a must-have style accessory. .: Extremely strong plastic .: Super slim .: Impact resistant, durable .: Rubber inside plate
item.content:encoded:
These premium, super slim cases fit flawlessly, in the meantime being the strongest, lightest and most flexible cases on the market. The surface is perfect for high quality prints, making it a must-have style accessory.

.: Extremely strong plastic
.: Super slim
.: Impact resistant, durable
.: Rubber inside plate

item.title: Coffee Mug (‘Loose Me’ Album Art)
item.dc:creator: Judson L Moore
item.description: 11oz Height, in 3.74 Diameter, in 3.14 Never run out of your favorite hot drink! Durable ceramic mug in always fashionable black color. High quality sublimation printing makes it an appreciated gift to every true coffee or tea lover, who always asks for a refill. .: Black ceramic .: 11 oz (0.33 l) .: Rounded […]
item.content:encoded:
11oz
Height, in 3.74
Diameter, in 3.14

Never run out of your favorite hot drink! Durable ceramic mug in always fashionable black color. High quality sublimation printing makes it an appreciated gift to every true coffee or tea lover, who always asks for a refill.

.: Black ceramic
.: 11 oz (0.33 l)
.: Rounded corners
.: C-handle
